description:
Season: 18
Original Air Date: 8/24/2005

Ridge tells his brother that he wants Brooke to be happy, but he doesn’t know if he can leave her behind. A hurt Taylor overhears this statement. Meanwhile, Bridget is fearful that her phony abortion will push Nick right back into Brooke’s arms. Dante reveals that he wants to make a life with Bridget and Nick’s child; however, Bridget states that she still loves Nick.  Catherine overhears Nick tell Brooke that he wants to make Bridget happy, but after she leaves, Nick informs Brooke that his relationship with Bridget is over. Later, after Brooke reads about a storm at sea, she rushes off to see Nick. On his boat, Nick prepares for his voyage as he ignores weather advisories about a coming storm. Brooke begs Nick not to sail into the storm. Brooke then reveals that she loves Nick.
